column2: Tzu-kung asked, And what of me?
column3: Tzu kung asked, And what of me?

column2: Thou art a vessel, said the Master.
column3: Thou art a vessel, said the Master.

column2: When Tzu-lu heard this he was glad.
column3: When Tzu lu heard this he was glad.

column2: The Master said, I have met no firm man.
column3: The Master said, I have met no firm man.

column2: He was faithful, said the Master.
column3: He was faithful, said the Master.

column2: I do not know, said the Master: how should this amount to love?
column3: I do not know, said the Master: how should this amount to love?

column2: On coming to another kingdom he said, 'Like my lord Ts'ui,' and left it.
column3: On coming to another kingdom he said, 'Like my lord Ts'ui,' and left it.

column2: I do not know, said the Master: how should this amount to love?
column3: I do not know, said the Master: how should this amount to love?

column2: Chi Wen thought thrice before acting.
column3: Chi Wen thought thrice before acting.
